Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31194548] Gram-negative Bacteria:Escherichia coli K12 (MIC=1.6μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=3.1μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA214(MIC=3.1μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA287(MIC=3.1μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA330(MIC=6.3μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA380(MIC=6.3μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31194548] 81% (± 9.4) hemolysis at 40μM against human blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Peptides are shown as ideal helices with side chains shown as stick models for Lys, Trp, and Phe and  as space-filling models.

Literature.Title: Positive Charge Patterning and Hydrophobicity of Membrane-Active Antimicrobial Peptides as Determinants of Activity, Toxicity, and Pharmacokinetic Stability
Literature.Author: Stone TA, Cole GB, Ravamehr-Lake D, Nguyen HQ, Khan F, Sharpe S, Deber CM
